description.title: Log Categories
description.author: $Author: jz $
description.p: Almost all SOS software components including the Scheduler can protocol their internal operations. This protocol is called a log. The content of log files is of particular interest to program developers. However, users can also solve problems by analysing the content of log files. Log files can be activated by entering log=file_name in the .ini file.

For Example - to record the activities of the Job Scheduler in the factory.ini file:
[spooler]
log = c:/tmp/scheduler.log
Log categories are used to limit the size of log files, by specifing what should be entered in the log file.
Log categories are separated by blanks and specified in front of a ">" symbol, which in turn preceeds the file name.
